member.summary: A region of the document represented as a JSON string. See anchor documentation for details on how to define and interpret anchor properties.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Comment.Author
member.summary: The user who wrote this comment.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Comment.Content
member.summary: The plain text content used to create this comment. This is not HTML safe and should only be used as a starting point to make edits to a comment's content.

member.summary: The context of the file which is being commented on.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Comment.CreatedDateRaw
member.summary: The date when this comment was first created.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Comment.Deleted
member.summary: Whether this comment has been deleted. If a comment has been deleted the content will be cleared and this will only represent a comment that once existed.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Comment.FileId
member.summary: The file which this comment is addressing.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Comment.FileTitle
member.summary: The title of the file which this comment is addressing.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Comment.HtmlContent
member.summary: HTML formatted content for this comment.

member.summary: A link back to this comment.

member.summary: The status of this comment. Status can be changed by posting a reply to a comment with the desired status. - "open" - The comment is still open. - "resolved" - The comment has been resolved by one of its replies.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Comment.ContextData
member.summary: The context of the file which is being commented on.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Comment.ContextData.Type
member.summary: The MIME type of the context snippet.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Comment.ContextData.Value
member.summary: Data representation of the segment of the file being commented on. In the case of a text file for example, this would be the actual text that the comment is about.

member.summary: A JSON representation of a list of comments on a file in Google Drive.

member.summary: A link to the next page of comments.

member.summary: The token to use to request the next page of results.

member.summary: The user who wrote this reply.

member.summary: The date when this reply was first created.

member.summary: Whether this reply has been deleted. If a reply has been deleted the content will be cleared and this will only represent a reply that once existed.

member.summary: HTML formatted content for this reply.

member.summary: The date when this reply was last modified.

member.summary: The action this reply performed to the parent comment. When creating a new reply this is the action to be perform to the parent comment. Possible values are: - "resolve" - To resolve a comment. - "reopen" - To reopen (un-resolve) a comment.

member.summary: A link to the next page of replies.

member.summary: Whether the current user can comment on the file.

member.summary: Whether the file can be copied by the current user.

member.summary: Create time for this file (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp).

member.summary: A link to open this file with the user's default app for this file. Only populated when the drive.apps.readonly scope is used.

member.summary: A short description of the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Editable
member.summary: Whether the file can be edited by the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.EmbedLink
member.summary: A link for embedding the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ExplicitlyTrashed
member.summary: Whether this file has been explicitly trashed, as opposed to recursively trashed.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ExportLinks
member.summary: Links for exporting Google Docs to specific formats.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.FileExtension
member.summary: The file extension used when downloading this file. This field is read only. To set the extension, include it in the title when creating the file. This is only populated for files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.FileSize
member.summary: The size of the file in bytes. This is only populated for files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.FolderColorRgb
member.summary: Folder color as an RGB hex string if the file is a folder. The list of supported colors is available in the folderColorPalette field of the About resource. If an unsupported color is specified, it will be changed to the closest color in the palette.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.HeadRevisionId
member.summary: The ID of the file's head revision. This will only be populated for files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.IconLink
member.summary: A link to the file's icon.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ImageMediaMetadata
member.summary: Metadata about image media. This will only be present for image types, and its contents will depend on what can be parsed from the image content.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.IndexableText
member.summary: Indexable text attributes for the file (can only be written)

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Kind
member.summary: The type of file. This is always drive#file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Labels
member.summary: A group of labels for the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.LastModifyingUser
member.summary: The last user to modify this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.LastModifyingUserName
member.summary: Name of the last user to modify this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.LastViewedByMeDateRaw
member.summary: Last time this file was viewed by the user (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.MarkedViewedByMeDateRaw
member.summary: Time this file was explicitly marked viewed by the user (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Md5Checksum
member.summary: An MD5 checksum for the content of this file. This is populated only for files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.MimeType
member.summary: The MIME type of the file. This is only mutable on update when uploading new content. This field can be left blank, and the mimetype will be determined from the uploaded content's MIME type.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ModifiedByMeDateRaw
member.summary: Last time this file was modified by the user (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp). Note that setting modifiedDate will also update the modifiedByMe date for the user which set the date.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ModifiedDateRaw
member.summary: Last time this file was modified by anyone (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp). This is only mutable on update when the setModifiedDate parameter is set.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.OpenWithLinks
member.summary: A map of the id of each of the user's apps to a link to open this file with that app. Only populated when the drive.apps.readonly scope is used.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.OriginalFilename
member.summary: The original filename if the file was uploaded manually, or the original title if the file was inserted through the API. Note that renames of the title will not change the original filename. This will only be populated on files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.OwnedByMe
member.summary: Whether the file is owned by the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.OwnerNames
member.summary: Name(s) of the owner(s) of this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Parents
member.summary: Collection of parent folders which contain this file. Setting this field will put the file in all of the provided folders. On insert, if no folders are provided, the file will be placed in the default root folder.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Permissions
member.summary: The list of permissions for users with access to this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.QuotaBytesUsed
member.summary: The number of quota bytes used by this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.SelfLink
member.summary: A link back to this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Shareable
member.summary: Whether the file's sharing settings can be modified by the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Shared
member.summary: Whether the file has been shared.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.SharedWithMeDateRaw
member.summary: Time at which this file was shared with the user (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.SharingUser
member.summary: User that shared the item with the current user, if available.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Spaces
member.summary: The list of spaces which contain the file. Supported values are 'drive' and 'appDataFolder'.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Thumbnail
member.summary: Thumbnail for the file. Only accepted on upload and for files that are not already thumbnailed by Google.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ThumbnailLink
member.summary: A short-lived link to the file's thumbnail. Typically lasts on the order of hours.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.UserPermission
member.summary: The permissions for the authenticated user on this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Version
member.summary: A monotonically increasing version number for the file. This reflects every change made to the file on the server, even those not visible to the requesting user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.VideoMediaMetadata
member.summary: Metadata about video media. This will only be present for video types.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.WebContentLink
member.summary: A link for downloading the content of the file in a browser using cookie based authentication. In cases where the content is shared publicly, the content can be downloaded without any credentials.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.WebViewLink
member.summary: A link only available on public folders for viewing their static web assets (HTML, CSS, JS, etc) via Google Drive's Website Hosting.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.WritersCanShare
member.summary: Whether writers can share the document with other users.

member.summary: The aperture used to create the photo (f-number).

member.summary: The make of the camera used to create the photo.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ImageMediaMetadataData.CameraModel
member.summary: The model of the camera used to create the photo.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ImageMediaMetadataData.ColorSpace
member.summary: The color space of the photo.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ImageMediaMetadataData.Date

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ImageMediaMetadataData.ExposureBias
